titleStmt.title: Ionah the messenger of Ninevehs repentance Set forth in his calling, rebellion, and punishment. By H.S.
Sixe sermons. Selections
titleStmt.author: Smith, Henry, 1550?-1591.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. M[iller] for G. E[dwards] and are to be sold at the Grey-hound in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Printer's and publisher's names from STC.
An abridgement of the Jonah sermons in STC 22775.7 to which Edwards now had the rights--STC.
Identified as STC 21496 on UMI microfilm.
Imperfect as filmed; first page lacking.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
